headline.main: Seavey Chases Elusive 5th Title as Iditarod Starts Saturday
headline.print_headline: Seavey Chases Elusive 5th Title as Iditarod Starts Saturday

lead_paragraph: Investment manager Orbis Investment Management Ltd on Friday disclosed a stake of about 2.8 percent in U.S. speciality metals maker Arconic Inc, and said it intends to support hedge fund Elliott Management Corp in its proxy battle against the company.
